bioghist.p: The Register of Wills probates wills and appoints representatives for decedents who die with or without a will.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two volumes of transcribed wills from the Philadelphia County Register of Wills, 1763-1764 and 1878-1790. The first volume was apparently transcribed in the late nineteenth century. This volume also includes a copy of the will of Robert Pigott, registered in 1798. The second volume includes several pages that appear to have been transcribed in a later period (probably also late nineteenth century), while the remainder of the volume appears to date from an earlier period. The registrar for the wills in the second volume is George Campbell.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
